body.p: In developing the revised Conceptual Framework, the Board published a Discussion Paper in 2013 (2013 Discussion Paper) and an Exposure Draft in 2015 (2015 Exposure Draft). After considering feedback on these documents and information gained from outreach, in 2018 the Board completed its Conceptual Framework project when it issued the revised Conceptual Framework for Financial Reporting (2018 Conceptual Framework).
